pages.text: $(1)I find it curious that, so far, we have not focused our attention on the mechanics of the Nether Portal. Why should some igneous stone and a flame create a connection to that bizarre Underworld?

$(1)Intuitively, we might imagine this is a result of Warp Power, due to, well, it being a portal; the power contained in $(item)Crying Obsidian$(1) should reveal if that theory is correct. $(br2)I wonder if $(4)a Symbol might allow access to a Portal's Power$(1)?
